pullrequest.title: [Suggestion] Return positive infinity instead of -1 for boundless positive values

content.raw:
let's target a test at libsdformat9 that ensure `Inf` can be specified

and change the behavior of negative values in libsdformat10. I'm not sure if we can convert negative joint limits to `Inf` during 1.7 -> 1.8?
